hero.paragraph: The company of Indo charcoal supply was established in 2021 with a strong commitment to providing customers with the best, fastest, and most reliable services. Since its inception, the company has focused on the production and export of high-quality briquettes.

values.integrityDescription: We are committed to conducting business with honesty, ethics and transparency in every aspect of our operations.
values.qualityDescription: We always prioritize quality in every product and service we offer to meet and exceed customer expectations.
values.innovationDescription: We always prioritize quality in every product and service we offer to meet and exceed customer expectations.
values.satisfactionDescription: We conduct our business with honesty, transparency, and ethical principles.
values.serviceDescription: We prioritize customer satisfaction through responsive, attentive, and professional service.
values.cooperationDescription: We believe that cooperation and collaboration with customers, business partners, and communities is the key to achieving mutual success.

vision.title: Our Vision and Mission
vision.vision: To be a leading export company that provides high quality and sustainable products, and makes a positive contribution to the global economy.
vision.mission1: Establish long-term relationships with customers and business partners based on trust and mutual satisfaction.
vision.mission2: Develop an efficient and reliable international distribution network to meet the needs of the global market.
vision.mission3: Enhance employee skills and welfare through continuous training and professional development.

product.customDescription: Partner with us to design custom briquette shapes and sizes that reflect your brand identity, inside and out.

shipping.aboutParagraph1: Our team can provide support with your shipping needs. Please contact us for further information.
shipping.aboutParagraph2: Our minimum order quantity (MOQ) is 1 container 18 tons (20â€™ft). Contact us to discuss your needs with our team to determine the optimal MOQ for your business.
shipping.guideParagraph: We ensure secure transactions with T/T and L/C payment methods. A 50% deposit confirms your order and starts production. The final 50% is processed upon production completion.

packaging.title: Packaging Options
packaging.masterDescription: This large master box is designed to hold and protect your charcoal briquettes during shipping and storage.
packaging.innerDescription: This box is designed to protect your briquettes from moisture and damage, making them easy to carry and store.
packaging.customizationText: Our master boxes can be customized to feature your logo and branding.
packaging.customizationSuffix: to discuss your custom design needs.
